org.netbeans.libs.git

Class GitLineDetails

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.netbeans.libs.git.GitLineDetails

  • public final class GitLineDetails
extends Object
    Contains information needed to construct a file's line annotation.

    • Method Summary

      GitUser getAuthor() 
      GitUser getCommitter() 
      String getContent()

    • Method Detail

      • getAuthor

        public GitUser getAuthor()
        Returns:
        line's last modification's author

      • getCommitter

        public GitUser getCommitter()
        Returns:
        line's last modification's committer

      • getRevisionInfo

        public GitRevisionInfo getRevisionInfo()
        Returns:
        information about the commit that modified the line

      • getSourceFile

        public File getSourceFile()
        Returns:
        the file that provided the line of the result. Can be different from the current file if the file was renamed.

      • getSourceLine

        public int getSourceLine()
        Returns:
        the original line number in the original file returned by getSourceFile in the revision returned by getRevisionInfo.

      • getContent

        public String getContent()
        Returns:
        current content of the file's line
